sentences: The Current Employment Statistics (CES) program produces detailed industry estimates of nonfarm employment, hours, and earnings of workers on payrolls.
label: true_

sentences: CES National Estimates produces data for the nation, and CES State and Metro Area produces estimates for all 50 States, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and about 450 metropolitan areas and divisions.
label: true_

sentences: Each month, CES surveys approximately 149,000 businesses and government agencies, representing approximately 651,000 individual worksites.
label: true_

sentences: Next Releases: The Employment Situation for June 2018 is scheduled to be released on July 6, 2018, at 8:30 A.M. Eastern Time.
label: true_

sentences: Real Earnings for May 2018 is scheduled to be released on June 12, 2018, at 8:30 A.M. Eastern Time.
label: true_

sentences: Current Employment Statistics Contacts Staff members of the Current Employment Statistics are available Monday through Friday 8:30 AM TO 4:30 PM EASTERN TIME for your assistance.
label: true_
